snippet: Jordan’s armed forces said in a statement that warplanes fired on the three vehicles after they failed to heed security forces’ demands to stop.
abstract: Jordanian warplanes destroy three vehicles trying to enter the country from neighboring Syria in an unusual strike that underscores Jordan’s intensive efforts to maintain control over a border crisscrossed by smugglers, Syrian insurgents and refugees.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and KARAM SHOUMALI
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul. Ben Hubbard contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: Jordan’s armed forces said in a statement that warplanes fired on the three vehicles after they failed to heed security forces’ demands to stop.

headline.main: Jordanian Jets Strike Vehicles Trying to Enter From Syria
headline.print_headline: Jordanian Jets Strike Vehicles Trying to Enter From Syria
